poemsDataJson.list_full: 逢(あ)ひ見(み)ての 後(のち)の心(こころ)に くらぶれば 昔(むかし)はものを 思(おも)はざりけり
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: I have met my love.//When I compare this present//With feelings of the past,//My passion is now as if//I have never loved before.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Ai mite no|Nochi no kokoro ni|Kurabureba|Mukashi wa mono o|Omowa zari keri
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: むかしはものを おもはさりけり
poemsDataJson.author: 権中納言敦忠(ごんちゅうなごんあつただ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 契りを結んでからの深い恋心の切なさ
